item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A man powers home for eight years using a thousand old laptop batteries (252 points | 126 comments)
2. Electron band structure in germanium, my ass (576 points | 226 comments)
3. The Myst Graph: A New Perspective on Myst (91 points | 15 comments)
4. Bletchley code breaker Betty Webb dies aged 101 (257 points | 41 comments)
5. Show HN: Zig Topological Sort Library for Parallel Processing (43 points | 17 comments)
6. Silica Gel Took over the World (23 points | 3 comments)
7. Generate autounattend.xml files for Windows 10/11 (60 points | 11 comments)
8. Dave Täht has passed away (21 points | 4 comments)
9. Systems Correctness Practices at AWS: Leveraging Formal and Semi-Formal Methods (91 points | 24 comments)
10. Show HN: Nue – Apps lighter than a React button (614 points | 448 comments)
11. RubyUI (Former PhlexUI): Ruby Gem for RubyUI Components (68 points | 13 comments)
12. The April Fools joke that might have got me fired (348 points | 173 comments)
13. Meru Health (YC S18) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. Excitable cells (234 points | 38 comments)
15. Launch HN: ASim (YC S21) – Mobile app that generates mobile apps (32 points | 26 comments)
16. CERN scientists find evidence of quantum entanglement in sheep (223 points | 80 comments)
17. Show HN: Duolingo-style exercises but with real-world content like the news (374 points | 150 comments)
18. Debts, Tech and Otherwise (20 points | 4 comments)

20. Camelgate NPM Outage (Cloudflare) (62 points | 16 comments)
21. US Marines to get high-speed, radar-evading electric seagliders for rescue ops (109 points | 73 comments)
22. Show HN: Make SVGs interactive in React with 1 line (6 points | 1 comment)
23. Show HN: Qwen-2.5-32B is now the best open source OCR model (17 points | 3 comments)
24. Why F#? (272 points | 243 comments)
25. Chess324 – A Chess Variant to Reduce Draws (20 points | 33 comments)
26. A deliberate practice app for guitar players who want to level up (401 points | 126 comments)
27. Globe Gores (27 points | 2 comments)
28. Go Optimization Guide (421 points | 128 comments)
29. Actually drawing some ovals – that are not ellipses (2017) (32 points | 13 comments)
30. Experimental Tauri Verso Integration (114 points | 34 comments)
